mapper.select: select * from sys_user_fun c where c.s_user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.i_bus_function_id, c.i_bus_model_id, f.s_name AS funName, m.s_name AS modelName FROM sys_user_fun c, oa_bus_model m, oa_bus_function f WHERE c.s_user_id = #{userId} AND c.i_bus_function_id = f.i_id AND c.i_bus_model_id = m.i_id
